title: Losing Lp When I Won for "AFK Behavior"
body: While I was playing a game, my house lost power and the internet went down. I came back and won the game. I was surprised to find out I lost LP since I had "afk behavior." Can Riot change this?

replies.body: Kokua is on point here. One minor thing to add, being AFK in a ranked match will mark you as losing even if your team pulls through and wins with you AFK'd or having *been* AFK.

Their system was made so that they are unable to change it to prevent abuse. It seems that you were missing from your game long enough for the system to mark you as AFK, and therefore you were disqualified from any rewards from that game, and received a minor penalty.
That's so lame. I rather have a wait time to get in game than have that.
